sections.generatorText: Discover delicious recipes. Our artificial intelligence provides you with recipes tailored to your tastes and needs. Finding inspiration for your daily meals has never been easier!
sections.searchText: Forget the question 'What can I cook with what I have in the pantry?' Our app uses an advanced algorithm to find recipes for you or from the community based on what you ask for. Just ask, 'I want something with pasta' or 'I want something healthy.' Ask whatever you need!
sections.chatbotText: Hi, I'm Ellie! I'm Foodai's virtual assistant, and I'm here to help you at every step of our recipes. Ask me anything, from cooking techniques to ingredient tips for the recipe. Whether you're an experienced chef or a beginner, I'm ready to answer your questions and provide you with an exceptional user experience.
sections.groupText: Join a passionate community of food lovers and share your own culinary creations. Post your favorite recipes and discover new ideas to impress your loved ones in the kitchen. Cooking is much more fun when you share it with other enthusiasts.
sections.platformText: Our app is regularly updated with new recipes, features, and improvements. We're always working to provide you with the best culinary experience possible. Stay up to date with the latest updates and enjoy a constant flow of new ideas and improvements in the app.
